data.title: ELearning (The Engine of The Knowledge Economy)
data.meta_description:
ELearning (the Engine of the Knowledge Economy) - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides an overview of the emerging eLearning industry. Some key points:

- eLearning will be critical for success in the new knowledge economy by facilitating customized, timely education. 
- The eLearning industry is addressing problems in traditional education through technology-based learning solutions.
- Rapid growth is expected due to swelling demand and the highly scalable business models of eLearning companies.
- The industry is still young and fragmented, but significant investment and adoption suggest continued expansion.
- eLearning companies are categorized based on the content/services/technology they offer and their target markets.
- The overall learning market consists of academic, corporate, and consumer sectors, each with different growth drivers.
data.text: ELearning (The Engine of The Knowledge Economy)
